tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive account status information including restrictions, flags, and current standing.

account_id.description: Account identifier to check status for

include_history.description: Whether to include recent account history

include_restrictions.description: Whether to include active restrictions and flags

error_messages: Account not found: Invalid account_id provided.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to access account status.
Account lookup timeout: Unable to retrieve account status within timeout period.
usage: Provide account_id from successful account lookup. Set include_history=true for detailed recent activity and include_restrictions=true for security flags.

account_status.description: Current account status: active, suspended, closed, or frozen

account_age_days.description: Number of days since account creation

active_restrictions.description: List of current account restrictions or flags

verification_level.description: Current identity verification level for account

support_notes_count.description: Number of support interaction notes on file
